speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Thompson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling in regard to an outstanding debt with your account. Before we discuss further, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that information. You currently have a balance of $450. How would you prefer to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can do a payment plan. How does that work?

speaker: Agent
text: We can set you up with a monthly payment of $75 for six months. Does that sound good?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I will set that up for you. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you! I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Sarah. Have a great day!
